sentences.en: Add sago into mango juice and diced mango.
sentences.cn: 西米加入芒果汁和芒果粒.

sentences.en: Drain the sago and set aside in container.
Here sago cycas trees blossom once every year.
sentences.cn: 在这里,铁树一年一开花.

sentences.en: Sago lays a foundation, put all fruits again, can.
sentences.cn: 西米铺底, 再放上所有水果, 即可.

sentences.en: The Sago Mine has been shut down at least for the time being.
sentences.cn: 萨戈媒矿至少已经暂时关闭了.

sentences.en: The special Sago Honey is the combination of honeydew juice sago, this sweet - to - tougue drink suits ladies.
sentences.cn: 特别的果冻蜜瓜饮料,里面有香甜的蜜瓜果汁,配上一粒粒的果冻, 甜甜的口感最适合女生了.

sentences.en: Turn cold water rinse the sago under the water.
sentences.cn: 把西米倒入过滤网,然后冲凉水备用.

trans.tran_en: small white grains obtained from some  palm  trees, used to make sweet dishes with milk
